sentences.english: One daily does of Fer-In-Sol Drops provides an excellent source of supplemental iron.
sentences.chinese: 每天一滴美赞臣补铁滴剂能够提供优质的补铁源。

sentences.english: We need the drops, and we need them soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要口服滴剂，而且愈快愈好。

sentences.english: Aim The oral drops of dermatophagoides farinae for the inhibition of allergy was studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨粉尘螨口服滴剂的抗过敏作用特点。

sentences.english: Place vitamin C drops and sore throat lozenges in your bag or purse.
sentences.chinese: 在包钱包里放点维生素C滴剂和润喉片。

sentences.english: Second-weekend drops for successful studio films typically are well below 50 percent.
sentences.chinese: 第二周末滴剂成功的电影工作室通常都远低于50%。

sentences.english: Saline nose drops or sprays also ease congestion.
sentences.chinese: 苦涩的滴剂或喷剂亦可缓解充血。

sentences.english: Conclusion In the treatment of acute pharyngolaryngitis, Sinupret is effective and safety.
sentences.chinese: 结论仙璐贝滴剂治疗急性咽喉炎安全有效。

sentences.english: The prescription given by the doctor includes several drops.
sentences.chinese: 处方中，包括了几种滴剂。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the bioequiavailability of Levosulpiride drops.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究左舒必利滴剂的生物等效性。

sentences.english: The concentrations you attain in the external canal with topical antibiotic drops is MUCH higher.
sentences.chinese: 在外耳道局部使用的抗生素滴剂浓度更高。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preventive effects of fluoride drop on dental caries for children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氟化钠滴剂对儿童乳牙龋病的预防作用。

sentences.english: I want to buy Amoxycillin granules and Bufferin drops.
sentences.chinese: 我要买阿莫西林颗粒和百服宁滴剂。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
Ibuprofen or Nurofen/also called 異丁苯丙酸|异丁苯丙酸

pinyin: dui4 yi3 xian1 an1 ji1 fen1
